title: Sort Total Orders by overdue days within each design code group

requirements.text: In the Total Orders tab (TotalOrdersTab.tsx), after grouping Pending/ReturnFromHallmark orders by design code, sort the orders within each design code group by overdue days in descending order (most overdue / oldest order date first). Overdue days should be calculated as the number of days elapsed since the order's orderDate. Orders with a null or missing orderDate should be placed at the bottom of each group.

quotes: It should be sorted as per each design code group.
the data should be categorised as per overdue order from top to bottom for each design code separately

acceptanceCriteria: In Total Orders tab, orders are grouped by design code as before.
Within each design code group, the order with the highest overdue days (oldest orderDate) appears first.
Orders with no orderDate appear at the bottom of their respective design code group.
The sorting is applied consistently across all design code groups.
No existing features (search, filter, karigar, order type) are affected.

constraints: Do not alter the existing grouping-by-design-code structure in TotalOrdersTab.
Do not change any other tab (Ready, Hallmark, Customer Orders, Karigars).
Do not modify backend data model or queries.
nonGoals: Sorting across design code groups (only within each group).
Changes to the Ageing Stock page sorting.
